DOC.brief_summary: Rigorous clinical practice assessment is a key factor to improve patient's care and prognosis in interventional cardiology (IC). A multicentric IC observational study (CRAC), fully integrated to usual coronary activity report software, started in Centre Val de Loire (CVL) region in 2014. CRAC observatory was conduced on five IC CathLab of CVL region. Quality of collected data is regularly evaluated and allowed building an exhaustive, and reliable database. This solution could easily be developed in other French regions.
DOC.criteria: Age =>18 years at enrollment Patient who have had a coronary angiogram or angioplasty Patient who didn't want to participated
